entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Campbell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:16 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Campbell River Airport 7:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 6.1°C
Wind: SE 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
